atk-s0511a28:2: ‘‘Aparimeyyito kappe, caturo āsuṁ vināyakā’’tiādikā aṭṭhārasagāthā saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitā nigamanagāthāti veditabbā. Sesagāthāsu sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a28:4_0: Imasmiṁ pana sakalepi buddhavaṁse niddiṭṭhānaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ aṭṭha vemattāni
atk-s0511a28:4_1: veditabbāni. Katamāni aṭṭha? Āyuvemattaṁ, pamāṇavemattaṁ, kulavemattaṁ, padhānavemattaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:5_0: Tattha āyuvemattaṁ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro koṇḍañño
atk-s0511a28:5_1: anomadassī padumo padumuttaro atthadassī dhammadassī siddhattho tissoti ime nava
atk-s0511a28:5_2: buddhā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṁ. Maṅgalo sumano sobhito nārado sumedho sujāto
atk-s0511a28:5_3: piyadassī phussoti ime aṭṭha buddhā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ. Revato vessabhū
atk-s0511a28:5_4: cāti ime dve buddhā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṁ. Vipassī bhagavā asītivassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a28:5_5: ahosi. Sikhī kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapoti ime cattāro buddhā yathākkamena sattaticattālīsatiṁsavīsavassasahassāyukā
atk-s0511a28:5_6: ahesuṁ. Amhākaṁ pana bhagavato vassasataṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi. Upacitapuññasambhārānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:5_8: ahosi. Ayaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ āyuvemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:6_0: Pamāṇavemattaṁ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā. Tathā hi dīpaṅkara-revata-piyadassī-atthadassī-dhammadassī-vipassībuddhānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:6_2: kāyo ahosi. Sumanassa navutihatthubbedhaṁ sarīraṁ ahosi. Sobhita-anomadassī-paduma-padumuttara-phussabuddhānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:6_3: aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṁ sarīraṁ ahosi. Sujāto paṇṇāsahatthubbedhasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0511a28:6_6: ahesuṁ. Amhākaṁ bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthubbedho ahosi. Ayaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:7_0: Kulavemattaṁ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattiṁsu keci brāhmaṇakule. Tathā hi kakusandhakoṇāgamanakassapasammāsambuddhā
atk-s0511a28:7_1: brāhmaṇakule nibbattiṁsu. Dīpaṅkarādigotamabuddhapariyantā dvāvīsati buddhā khattiyakuleyeva
atk-s0511a28:7_2: nibbattiṁsu. Ayaṁ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṁ kulavemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:8_1: dasamāsikā padhānacariyā. Maṅgala-sumedhatissa sikhīnaṁ aṭṭhamāsikā. Revatassa sattamāsikā.
atk-s0511a28:8_2: Sobhitassa cattāro māsā. Padumaatthadassī vipassīnaṁ aḍḍhamāsikā. Nārada-padumuttara-dhammadassī-kassapānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:8_3: sattāhāni . Piyadassī-phussa-vessabhū koṇāgamanānaṁ chamāsikā. Amhākaṁ buddhassa
atk-s0511a28:8_4: chabbassāni padhānacariyā ahosi. Ayaṁ padhānavemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:9_0: Rasmivemattaṁ nāma maṅgalassa kira sammāsambuddhassa sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṁ
atk-s0511a28:9_1: pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Padumuttarabuddhassa dvādasayojanikā ahosi. Vipassissa bhagavato
atk-s0511a28:9_2: sattayojanikā ahosi. Sikhissa tiyojanappamāṇā. Kakusandhassa dasayojanikā. Amhākaṁ
atk-s0511a28:9_3: bhagavato samantato byāmappamāṇā. Sesānaṁ aniyatā ahosi. Ayaṁ rasmivemattaṁ nāma
atk-s0511a28:9_4: ajjhāsayapaṭibaddhaṁ, yo yattakaṁ icchati, tassa sarīrappabhā tattakaṁ pharati, paṭividdhaguṇe
atk-s0511a28:9_5: pana kassaci vemattaṁ nāma natthi. Ayaṁ rasmivemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:10_0: Yānavemattaṁ nāma keci hatthiyānena keci assayānena keci rathapada-pāsāda-sivikādīsu
atk-s0511a28:10_4: sivikāyānena. Nārado padasā nikkhami. Sobhita-padumuttara-dhammadassī-kassapā pāsādena
atk-s0511a28:11_0: Bodhivemattaṁ nāma dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kapītanarukkho bodhi; koṇḍaññassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a28:11_2: padumanāradānaṁ mahāsoṇarukkho, padumuttarassa salalarukkho, sumedhassa nīpo, sujātassa
atk-s0511a28:11_3: veḷu, piyadassino kakudho, atthadassissa campakarukkho, dhammadassissa rattakuravakarukkho,
atk-s0511a28:11_4: siddhatthassa kaṇikārarukkho, tissassa asanarukkho, phussassa āmalakarukkho, vipassissa
atk-s0511a28:11_5: pāṭalirukkho, sikhissa puṇḍarīkarukkho, vessabhussa sālarukkho, kakusandhassa sirīsarukkho,
atk-s0511a28:11_6: koṇāgamanassa udumbararukkho, kassapassa nigrodho, gotamassa assatthoti ayaṁ bodhivemattaṁ nāma.
atk-s0511a28:12_4: sikhissa dvattiṁsahattho , kakusandhassa chabbīsatihattho, koṇāgamanassa vīsatihattho,
atk-s0511a28:12_5: kassapassa pannarasahattho, gotamassa cuddasahattho pallaṅko ahosi. Ayaṁ pallaṅkavemattaṁ
atk-s0511a28:14_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ pana cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti. Sabbabuddhānañhi bodhipallaṅko
atk-s0511a28:14_1: avijahito ekasmiṁyeva ṭhāne hoti. Dhammacakkappavattanaṁ isipatane migadāye avijahitameva
atk-s0511a28:14_2: hoti. Devorohaṇakāle saṅkassanagaradvāre paṭhamakkapādaṭṭhānaṁ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0511a28:14_3: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti. Vihāro pana
atk-s0511a28:14_4: khuddakopi mahantopi hoti. Vihāro na vijahatiyeva, nagaraṁ pana vijahati.
atk-s0511a28:16_0: Aparaṁ pana amhākaṁyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṁ.
atk-s0511a28:16_1: Amhākaṁ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṁ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako
atk-s0511a28:16_2: assarājā nidhikumbho mahābodhi kāḷudāyīti imāni satta sahajātāni. Ayaṁ sahajātaparicchedo.
atk-s0511a28:16_3: Mahāpuriso pana uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṁ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhami,
atk-s0511a28:16_4: dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ akāsi. Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho
atk-s0511a28:16_5: ca parinibbuto ca. Māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ca āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca
atk-s0511a28:18_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṁ buddhānaṁ sādhāraṇadhammataṁ pakāsayissāma. Sabbabuddhānaṁ samattiṁsavidhā
atk-s0511a28:18_2: mātukucchiyaṁ pallaṅkena nisīditvā bahimukholokanaṁ, ṭhitāya bodhisattamātuyā vijāyanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_3: araññeyeva mātukucchito nikkhamanaṁ, kañcanapaṭṭesu patiṭṭhitapādānaṁ uttarābhimukhānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:18_4: sattapadavītihārānaṁ gantvā catuddisaṁ oloketvā sīhanādanadanaṁ, cattāri nimittāni
atk-s0511a28:18_5: disvā jātamattaputtānaṁ mahāsattānaṁ mahābhinikkhamanaṁ, arahaddhajamādāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a28:18_6: sabbaheṭṭhimena paricchedena sattāhaṁ padhānacariyā, sambodhiṁ pāpuṇanadivase pāyāsabhojanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_8: mārabalaviddhaṁsanaṁ, bodhipallaṅkeyeva tisso vijjā ādiṁ katvā asādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇapaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a28:18_9: sattasattāhaṁ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmanaṁ, mahābrahmuno dhammadesanatthāya āyācanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_10: isipatane migadāye dhammacakkappavattanaṁ, māghapuṇṇamāya caturaṅgikasannipāte pātimokkhuddeso,
atk-s0511a28:18_12: abhidhammadesanā, saṅkassanagaradvāre devalokato otaraṇaṁ satataṁ phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṁ,
atk-s0511a28:18_13: dvīsu vāresu veneyyajanāvalokanaṁ, uppanne vatthumhi sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṁ uppannāya
atk-s0511a28:18_14: aṭṭhuppattiyā jātakakathanaṁ, ñātisamāgame buddhavaṁsakathanaṁ, āgantukehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0511a28:18_15: paṭisanthārakaraṇaṁ, nimantitānaṁ vuṭṭhavassānaṁ anāpucchā agamanaṁ, divase divase
atk-s0511a28:20_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ cattāro anantarāyikā dhammā. Katame cattāro? Buddhānaṁ uddissa abhihaṭānaṁ
atk-s0511a28:20_1: catunnaṁ paccayānaṁ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṁ. Buddhānaṁ āyuno na sakkā kenaci
atk-s0511a28:20_2: antarāyo kātuṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso, yaṁ parūpakkamena tathāgataṁ
atk-s0511a28:20_4: anubyañjanānañca na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṁ. Buddharaṁsīnaṁ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo
atk-s0511a28:20_5: kātunti. Ime cattāro anantarāyikā dhammā nāmāti.
atk-s0511a28:36: Yathā buddhavaṁsassa saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ, gatā sādhu siddhiṁ vinā antarāyaṁ;
atk-s0511a28:37: Tathā dhammayuttā janānaṁ vitakkā, vināvantarāyena siddhiṁ vajantu.
atk-s0511a28:38: Imaṁ buddhavaṁsassa saṁvaṇṇanaṁ me, karontena yaṁ patthitaṁ puññajātaṁ;
atk-s0511a28:39: Sadā tassa devānubhāvena loko, dhuvaṁ santamaccantamatthaṁ payātaṁ.
atk-s0511a28:40: Vinassantu rogā manussesu sabbe, pavassantu devāpi vassantakāle;
atk-s0511a28:41: Sukhaṁ hotu niccaṁ varaṁ nārakāpi, pisācāpayātā pipāsā bhavantu.
atk-s0511a28:42: Surā accharānaṁ gaṇādīhi saddhiṁ, ciraṁ devaloke sukhaṁ cānubhontu;
atk-s0511a28:43: Ciraṁ ṭhātu dhammo munindassa loke, sukhaṁ lokapālā mahiṁ pālayantu.
atk-s0511a28:48: Iti bhāṇavāravasena chabbīsatibhāṇavārā, ganthavasena pañcasatādhikachasahassaganthā, akkharavasena tisahassādhikāni dvesatasahassakkharāni.
atk-s0511a28:49: Antarāyaṁ vinā esā, yathā niṭṭhaṁ upāgatā;
